name: Greenwood Park
description: A popular public park with walking trails, picnic areas, and a small lake for paddle boating.

name: Sunset Diner
description: A retro-style diner known for its classic burgers, milkshakes, and friendly atmosphere.

name: Central City Museum
description: A local museum featuring historical exhibits, rotating art galleries, and cultural workshops.

name: Riverside Mall
description: The largest shopping mall in the area with a wide range of stores, restaurants, and a cinema.

name: TechHub Library
description: A modern library offering free WiFi, study spaces, and access to technology and coding resources.

name: Skyline Tower
description: An observation tower that gives visitors a panoramic view of the city, especially beautiful at sunset.

name: Blue Lagoon Café
description: A cozy café by the water offering freshly brewed coffee, pastries, and a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Mountain View Theater
description: A performing arts center hosting concerts, plays, and community events throughout the year.
